title: Agronomist - Plant Health & Nutrition
eligibility: B.Sc./M.Sc. in Agronomy or a related field
summary: B.Sc./M.Sc. in Agronomy or a related field 2. Minimum 5 years of experience- in plant health management, soil nutrition, and crop management
responsibilities: Develop and implement plant health and nutrition programs for optimal crop growth.
Conduct soil and plant analysis to identify and address nutrient deficiencies.
Optimize growth conditions through data-driven adjustments.
Collaborate with the team to enhance yield & quality.
Provide expert recommendations on fertilizers, pest control, and organic farming practices.

title: Plant Irrigation Specialist
eligibility: B.Sc./M.Sc. in Agricultural Engineering* or a related field
summary: Minimum 5 years of experience- in irrigation system design, water management, and precision irrigation techniques
responsibilities: Design and manage efficient irrigation systems for large-scale plantations
Monitor soil moisture levels and optimize water usage
Implement modern irrigation technologies such as drip and sprinkler systems
Collaborate with agronomists to ensure optimal plant hydration Regularly inspect and maintain irrigation systems to ensure they are functioning correctly.
Troubleshoot and repair any issues such as leaks, broken parts, or clogged emitters.
Test system pressure and efficiency to ensure consistent water distribution.
